item.title: 为debian10添加软件源
item.author: Spaceack
item.description: Debian 10添加163软件源： 1 2 3 4 5 vi /etc/apt/source.list deb http://mirrors.163.com/debian/ buster main contrib non-free deb http://mirrors.163.com/debian/ buster-updates main contrib non-free deb http://mirrors.163.com/debian-security/ buster/updates main contrib non-free :wq 其它debian发行版本同理，更改代号即可，历史代号可到官网查看
